title: Morse Code Trainer
description: A web-based Morse code training app with bidirectional translation, difficulty levels, streak tracking, and developer mode.
content:
Project Overview

Morse Code Trainer is a web application designed to help users learn and practice Morse code in a fun, interactive way. It supports both English→Morse and Morse→English translation, with multiple difficulty levels, streak and points tracking, and a hidden developer mode for advanced users and testing.

Key Features

  • Bidirectional Translation: Practice both English→Morse and Morse→English
  • Difficulty Modes: Choose between word or sentence practice, and select easy, medium, or hard levels
  • Streak & Points System: Track your progress with streaks, points, and visual effects for high scores
  • Developer Mode: Unlock advanced testing tools and answer revealers with a secret code
  • Accessible & Responsive: Works on all devices, keyboard-friendly, and visually clear

Technical Implementation

  • HTML5 & CSS3: Custom UI, responsive design, and terminal-inspired effects
  • Vanilla JavaScript: All logic, state, and effects implemented without frameworks
  • LocalStorage: Persistent streaks and points across sessions

How It Works

  • Choose your translation direction and difficulty in the settings
  • Type your answer and press space to submit
  • Hints and Morse code charts are available for reference
  • Unlock developer mode for streak testing and answer reveal
